Detailed Description

enum wxExListViewStandard::ListType

The supported lists.

Enumerator:
LIST_BEFORE_FIRST 

for iterating

a list to show statistics

a list to show find results

a list to show history items

a list to show keywords

a list to show replace results

a list to show process output

LIST_FILE 

a list associated with a file

a list to show revisions

a list to show embedded sql
